name: Bun Jump
description:
Controls: Simply hold down Mouse 1 and drag in the direction you want to propel your character to move!

Any criticism is extremely helpful! 

This is a mini rage platformer game inspired by games such as "Getting Over It With Bennett Foddy" and "Jump King", you maybe wondering what sets my game apart from the rest! its simple. unlike jumping to platform to platform you launch yourself up into the air climbing up to the Top!
